item.description:
The "price" is just a downpayment on dinner.

This meetup is subject to fair weather. If it's not possible to be on Dante's patio, we can go to Bambara or someplace else in the neigbhorhood... if we want. We'll discuss. The reason for the late startup time is mainly to be able to get onto the patio.

A number of people have suggested Dante. It happens to be a staple of mine! It's in the neighborhood and I just plop down on the patio to relax and watch the lights of Boston, caressed by the warm summer breeze.

The food and drink (Italian liberally interpreted) are generally excellent, but it doesn't come cheap.

Parking is easy: $4 in the Galleria across the street on Land Blvd ($4 after 5pm for up to ten hours). There is also valet parking. The T stops Lechmere (Green Line) and Kendall/MIT (Red Line) are each a ten minute walk.

For menus etc. see the website,
http://www.restaurant...
item.name: Dante
